data.title: RRATtrap: Rotating Radio Transient identifier
data.name: RRATtrap
data.description: A single-pulse sifting algorithm to identify RRATs and transients using output from Scott Ransom's PRESTO single_pulse_search.py . Code described and applied in Karako-Argaman et al. 2015: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2015ApJ...809...67K

evidence: "RRATtrap" (project name in README heading, typical of a standalone research code/tool distributed via its repo).
"A single-pulse sifting algorithm to identify RRATs and transients" (describes a domain-specific analysis algorithm, i.e., an application used to perform a research task).
"using output from Scott Ransom's PRESTO single_pulse_search.py" (indicates it operates on scientific analysis outputs, directly contributing to research results).
